text: What are you doing? Quickly take your hand away~~
Mouse... you placed it in the wrong spot!
What do you want to do?
Meow meow meow?
Scared (ノ≧∇≦)ノ
That's inappropriate! Help!
If you keep this up, I’ll have to use force!
I'm getting angry!
Don't touch me!
Really... how shameless!
Hentai!
Guess what I'm going to say?
I've heard a lot of life experiences from the Frog Prince.
Want to play a plane battle?
This button says 'Do not click'.
What, do you want to play a game with me?
I heard this can make you dance!
Do you not love me anymore, boohoo~
Want to meet my sister?
Want to see my little sister?
Do you want to switch the character?
Do you like dress-up play?
What should I dress up as this time?
Dress-up!
Let's see what happens next!
Are you going to take a picture of me? One, two, three~ Cheese~
How about we take a group photo!
Just keep smiling~
Do you want to know more about me?
This records my moving history.
What do you want to know about me?
Is it time to say goodbye?
Boohoo QAQ, see you next time...
Don't abandon me...
Will we meet again...?
Hmph, you'll regret it!

Did you see my teddy bear?

110? There's a pervert here touching me (ó﹏ò｡)

seasons.text: New Year's Day is here, a new year has begun, this year is {year}~
It's another year of Valentine's Day, have you found a partner this year~
Today is Tree Planting Day, let's protect the environment!
Let me tell you a secret~ Today is April Fool's Day, don't get tricked!
Today is Labor Day, have you planned where to go for the holiday~
Children's Day is here, happy times are always short, how nice it would be if we could never grow up...
Victory Day of the Chinese People's War of Resistance Against Japanese Aggression, remember history, cherish peace, and create the future.
It's Teacher's Day, be sure to greet your teachers at school~
National Day is here, let's celebrate our motherland!
Who did you spend this year's Double Eleven with~
These days are Christmas, my owner must be out shopping again~

time.text: Good morning! The plan for the day is in the morning, a beautiful day is about to begin~
Good morning! Is work going smoothly? Don't sit for too long, get up and move around!
It's noon, after a morning of work, it's lunchtime!
It's easy to feel sleepy in the afternoon, have you completed today's exercise goals?
It's evening! The sunset outside is beautiful, nothing is more beautiful than the sunset!
Good evening, how was your day?

text: It's already so late, better rest early, good night~
At night, take care of your eyes!

time.text: Are you a night owl? Why are you still awake so late? Can you get up tomorrow?

default: Long time no see, time flies so fast...
Big bad guy! How long have you ignored me, boohoo~
I'll punch you in the chest!
Remember to add this little home to your favorites!
message.console: Haha, you opened the console, do you want to see my little secrets?
message.copy: What have you copied? Remember to include the source when reprinting!
